message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product! It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11,000 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,200. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $11,500 for the product. Can we find a mutually beneficial price?
I understand you're still looking to make a profit, but I'm getting close to my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer, Bob! However, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $11,200, but that's as low as I can go. Can we finalize the deal at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit over budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but that's it. Can we finally seal the deal?

I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8,000.
